ingredients: 4 to 5 cup whole wheat (or white) bread flower
instructions: total time 4 hrs
Gently mix water,yeast, wheat bran, salt and 1 cup flower in a large mixing bowl. Let sit for 3 min while yeast bubles
Add two to three cups of flower and kneed untill it forms dough like a babies bottom. If sticky, add more flower.
Cover in a bowl and let sit untill it has doubled in size
preheat oven to 400 F
punch it down and form two loaves and then let sit for another 30 minutes (or longer )
put bread in oven for 30 minutes
enjoy with oil and vinger dip
total time 45 min
preheate oven to 375 F
Line bottom of pan with pleanty of sauce
top with three sheets of noodles, the sheets will expand while baking, so they dont need to completly cover previous layer
A layer of ricotta and mozeralla, this should go to the edge
Lather rince repeat
cover with foil and cook for 30 minutes
remove foil and brown cheese

ingredients: spices (oregono, basil, red pepper flakes, rosemary, salt, and pepper)
instructions: Mix all ingredient in a bowl... enjoy
Mix butter and sugar untill very creamy.
Mix in the rest of the ingredients and let the dough rest for 1 hour.
Roll out and cut circle cookies, (about 2 inches wide)
Bake very carefully untill light brown, about 10 minutes
Glaze: combine sugar, powdered sugar, and lemon juice. Want to end up with a rather thin glaze, and top cookies with it.

ingredients: low fat milk, enough to mkae a thin batter
instructions: Mix all ingredients
Cook over high heat in margerine
Very thin pancakes (almost like crepes) they cook really quickly.
